java/liquibase/parser/visitor/DBDocVisitor.java

00001 package liquibase.parser.visitor;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.ChangeSet;
00004 import liquibase.FileOpener;
00005 import liquibase.change.Change;
00006 import liquibase.database.Database;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00009 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseSnapshot;
00010 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00011 import liquibase.dbdoc.*;
00012 import liquibase.exception.DatabaseHistoryException;
00013 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00014 import liquibase.exception.LiquibaseException;
00015 import liquibase.util.StreamUtil;
00016 
00017 import java.io.File;
00018 import java.io.FileOutputStream;
00019 import java.io.IOException;
00020 import java.io.InputStream;
00021 import java.util.*;
00022 
00023 public class DBDocVisitor implements ChangeSetVisitor {
00024 
00025     private Database database;
00026 
00027     private SortedSet<ChangeLogInfo> changeLogs;
00028     private Map<DatabaseObject, List<Change>> changesByObject;
00029     private Map<String, List<Change>> changesByAuthor;
00030 
00031     private Map<DatabaseObject, List<Change>> changesToRunByObject;
00032     private Map<String, List<Change>> changesToRunByAuthor;
00033     private List<Change> changesToRun;
00034     private List<Change> recentChanges;
00035 
00036     private String rootChangeLog;
00037 
00038     private static final int MAX_RECENT_CHANGE = 50;
00039 
00040     public DBDocVisitor(Database database) {
00041         this.database = database;
00042 
00043         changesByObject = new HashMap<DatabaseObject, List<Change>>();
00044         changesByAuthor = new HashMap<String, List<Change>>();
00045         changeLogs = new TreeSet<ChangeLogInfo>();
00046 
00047         changesToRunByObject = new HashMap<DatabaseObject, List<Change>>();
00048         changesToRunByAuthor = new HashMap<String, List<Change>>();
00049         changesToRun = new ArrayList<Change>();
00050         recentChanges = new ArrayList<Change>();
00051     }
00052 
00053     public ChangeSetVisitor.Direction getDirection() {
00054         return ChangeSetVisitor.Direction.FORWARD;
00055     }
00056 
00057     public void visit(ChangeSet changeSet, Database database) throws LiquibaseException {
00058         ChangeSet.RunStatus runStatus = this.database.getRunStatus(changeSet);
00059         if (rootChangeLog == null) {
00060             rootChangeLog = changeSet.getFilePath();
00061         }
00062 
00063         if (!changesByAuthor.containsKey(changeSet.getAuthor())) {
00064             changesByAuthor.put(changeSet.getAuthor(), new ArrayList<Change>());
00065         }
00066         if (!changesToRunByAuthor.containsKey(changeSet.getAuthor())) {
00067             changesToRunByAuthor.put(changeSet.getAuthor(), new ArrayList<Change>());
00068         }
00069 
00070         boolean toRun = runStatus.equals(ChangeSet.RunStatus.NOT_RAN) || runStatus.equals(ChangeSet.RunStatus.RUN_AGAIN);
00071         for (Change change : changeSet.getChanges()) {
00072             if (toRun) {
00073                 changesToRunByAuthor.get(changeSet.getAuthor()).add(change);
00074                 changesToRun.add(change);
00075             } else {
00076                 changesByAuthor.get(changeSet.getAuthor()).add(change);
00077                 recentChanges.add(0, change);
00078             }
00079         }
00080 
00081 
00082         ChangeLogInfo changeLogInfo = new ChangeLogInfo(changeSet.getFilePath(), changeSet.getPhysicalFilePath());
00083         if (!changeLogs.contains(changeLogInfo)) {
00084             changeLogs.add(changeLogInfo);
00085         }
00086 
00087         for (Change change : changeSet.getChanges()) {
00088             Set<DatabaseObject> affectedDatabaseObjects = change.getAffectedDatabaseObjects();
00089             if (affectedDatabaseObjects != null) {
00090                 for (DatabaseObject dbObject : affectedDatabaseObjects) {
00091                     if (toRun) {
00092                         if (!changesToRunByObject.containsKey(dbObject)) {
00093                             changesToRunByObject.put(dbObject, new ArrayList<Change>());
00094                         }
00095                         changesToRunByObject.get(dbObject).add(change);
00096                     }
00097 
00098                     if (!changesByObject.containsKey(dbObject)) {
00099                         changesByObject.put(dbObject, new ArrayList<Change>());
00100                     }
00101                     changesByObject.get(dbObject).add(change);
00102                 }
00103             }
00104         }
00105     }
00106 
00107     public void writeHTML(File rootOutputDir, FileOpener fileOpener) throws IOException, JDBCException, DatabaseHistoryException {
00108         ChangeLogWriter changeLogWriter = new ChangeLogWriter(fileOpener, rootOutputDir);
00109         HTMLWriter authorWriter = new AuthorWriter(rootOutputDir, database);
00110         HTMLWriter tableWriter = new TableWriter(rootOutputDir, database);
00111         HTMLWriter columnWriter = new ColumnWriter(rootOutputDir, database);
00112         HTMLWriter pendingChangesWriter = new PendingChangesWriter(rootOutputDir, database);
00113         HTMLWriter recentChangesWriter = new RecentChangesWriter(rootOutputDir, database);
00114         HTMLWriter pendingSQLWriter = new PendingSQLWriter(rootOutputDir, database);
00115 
00116         copyFile("liquibase/dbdoc/stylesheet.css", rootOutputDir);
00117         copyFile("liquibase/dbdoc/index.html", rootOutputDir);
00118         copyFile("liquibase/dbdoc/globalnav.html", rootOutputDir);
00119         copyFile("liquibase/dbdoc/overview-summary.html", rootOutputDir);
00120 
00121         DatabaseSnapshot snapshot = database.createDatabaseSnapshot(null, null);
00122 
00123         new ChangeLogListWriter(rootOutputDir).writeHTML(changeLogs);
00124         new TableListWriter(rootOutputDir).writeHTML(new TreeSet<Object>(snapshot.getTables()));
00125         new AuthorListWriter(rootOutputDir).writeHTML(new TreeSet<Object>(changesByAuthor.keySet()));
00126 
00127         for (String author : changesByAuthor.keySet()) {
00128             authorWriter.writeHTML(author, changesByAuthor.get(author), changesToRunByAuthor.get(author), rootChangeLog);
00129         }
00130 
00131         for (Table table : snapshot.getTables()) {
00132             tableWriter.writeHTML(table, changesByObject.get(table), changesToRunByObject.get(table), rootChangeLog);
00133         }
00134 
00135         for (Column column : snapshot.getColumns()) {
00136             columnWriter.writeHTML(column, changesByObject.get(column), changesToRunByObject.get(column), rootChangeLog);
00137         }
00138 
00139         for (ChangeLogInfo changeLog : changeLogs) {
00140             changeLogWriter.writeChangeLog(changeLog.logicalPath, changeLog.physicalPath);
00141         }
00142 
00143         pendingChangesWriter.writeHTML("index", null, changesToRun, rootChangeLog);
00144         pendingSQLWriter.writeHTML("sql", null, changesToRun, rootChangeLog);
00145 
00146         if (recentChanges.size() > MAX_RECENT_CHANGE) {
00147             recentChanges = recentChanges.subList(0, MAX_RECENT_CHANGE);
00148         }
00149         recentChangesWriter.writeHTML("index", recentChanges, null, rootChangeLog);
00150 
00151     }
00152 
00153     private void copyFile(String fileToCopy, File rootOutputDir) throws IOException {
00154         InputStream inputStream = getClass().getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream(fileToCopy);
00155         FileOutputStream outputStream = null;
00156         try {
00157             if (inputStream == null) {
00158                 throw new IOException("Can not find " + fileToCopy);
00159             }
00160             outputStream = new FileOutputStream(new File(rootOutputDir, fileToCopy.replaceFirst(".*\\/", "")), false);
00161             StreamUtil.copy(inputStream, outputStream);
00162         } finally {
00163             if (outputStream != null) {
00164                 outputStream.close();
00165             }
00166         }
00167     }
00168 
00169     private static class ChangeLogInfo implements Comparable<ChangeLogInfo> {
00170         public String logicalPath;
00171         public String physicalPath;
00172 
00173 
00174         private ChangeLogInfo(String logicalPath, String physicalPath) {
00175             this.logicalPath = logicalPath;
00176             this.physicalPath = physicalPath;
00177         }
00178 
00179         public boolean equals(Object o) {
00180             if (this == o) return true;
00181             if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
00182 
00183             ChangeLogInfo that = (ChangeLogInfo) o;
00184 
00185             return logicalPath.equals(that.logicalPath);
00186 
00187         }
00188 
00189         public int hashCode() {
00190             return logicalPath.hashCode();
00191         }
00192 
00193         public int compareTo(ChangeLogInfo o) {
00194             return this.logicalPath.compareTo(o.logicalPath);
00195         }
00196 
00197         public String toString() {
00198             return logicalPath;
00199         }
00200     }
00201 }
